step.cmd: Sign in to with your user name or email address, and password.
In the Repositories section of your account dashboard, click New.
Enter a name and, optionally, a description for the repository.
Decide whether you want to make the repository private or public by selecting the appropriate radio button.

info.note: Unless you want to start an open source project that anyone can access and contribute to, it is generally recommended that you make your new repository private.

step.cmd: Select the Initialize this repository with a README check box and click Create repository.
Get the SSH URL by clicking Clone or download Copy to clipboard .
In a terminal, navigate to the target location where you want to clone your new repository by using the cd command.
step.stepxmp: To clone the repository to the Documents folder on Windows, enter the following command:cd %USERPROFILE%\Documents
